descriptionNullable:
# [Chinese Word Vectors 中文词向量](https://github.com/Embedding/Chinese-Word-Vectors/)
This project provides 100+ Chinese Word Vectors (embeddings) trained with different **representations** (dense and sparse), **context features** (word, ngram, character, and more), and **corpora**. One can easily obtain pre-trained vectors with different properties and use them for downstream tasks. 

Moreover, we provide a Chinese analogical reasoning dataset **CA8** and an evaluation toolkit for users to evaluate the quality of their word vectors.

该项目提供了100+中文词向量(嵌入)，用不同的表示(密集和稀疏)、上下文特征(单词、ngram、字符等)和语料库训练。人们可以很容易地获得预先训练好的具有不同属性的向量，并将它们用于下游任务。

此外，我们还提供了一个中文类比推理数据集CA8和一个评价工具包，供用户评估其词向量的质量。

## Toolkits
All word vectors are trained by [ngram2vec](https://github.com/zhezhaoa/ngram2vec/) toolkit. Ngram2vec toolkit is a superset of [word2vec](https://github.com/svn2github/word2vec) and [fasttext](https://github.com/facebookresearch/fastText) toolkit, where arbitrary context features and models are supported.
所有的词向量都是由ngram2vec工具箱训练的。Ngram2vec工具包是word2vec和fasttext工具包的超集，其中支持任意上下文特性和模型。

## Basic Settings
- The vector is 300d，词向量是300
- Mixed-large 综合: Baidu Encyclopedia 百度百科、Wikipedia_zh 中文维基百科、People's Daily News 人民日报、Sogou News 搜狗新闻、Financial News 金融新闻、Zhihu_QA 知乎问答、Weibo 微博、Literature 文学作品、Complete Library in Four Sections 四库全书


| file | Corpus | Context Features |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|`sgns.wiki.bigram-char.bz2` |Wikipedia_zh 中文维基百科 |Word + Character + Ngram|
|`sgns.weibo.bigram-char.bz2`|Weibo 微博|Word + Character + Ngram|
|`merge_sgns_bigram_char300.txt.bz2`|Mixed-large 综合|Word + Character + Ngram|


# Two Chinese dataset for sentiment analyze
- it comes from [千言](https://www.luge.ai/#/luge/dataDetail?id=25)

## ChnSentiCorp
A classic sentence-level sentiment classification dataset that contains hotel, laptop, and data-related web review data, with both positive and negative categories.
经典的句子级情感分类数据集，包含酒店、笔记本电脑和数据相关的网络评论数据，共包含积极、消极两个类别

## SE-ABSA16
Opinion-level sentiment classification is a fine-grained sentiment classification task that aims to classify sentiment for different evaluation objects or comment dimensions in the comment ledger. The dataset contains two categories: positive and negative. It covers data in two fields: mobile phones and cameras.
观点级情感分类是一种细粒度的情感分类任务，旨在评论分本中针对不同评价对象或者评论维度的情感分类。该数据集包含积极、消极两个类别。共覆盖手机、相机两个领域的数据。

## License
Apache License
title: ChineseNLPdataset
subtitle: word2vec and sentiment analyze
